patterns: What type of insurance is included with the rental?

responses: All of our rental vehicles come with basic insurance coverage. This coverage includes liability insurance and collision damage waiver. patterns: Can I cancel my reservation?

responses: Yes, you can cancel your reservation at any time. Our cancellation policy varies depending on the location and the type of vehicle.
